title: quickTabUpdateRate removed v1.6.2.2
details:
The quickTabUpdateRate setting was removed in v1.6.2.2 because the PointerEvents API now handles update rate automatically. The setting was removed from:
- popup.html (setting-group div)
- sidebar/settings.html (setting-group div)
- popup.js (defaults, load, save)
- sidebar/settings.js (defaults, load, save)

The setting allowed users to configure position updates per second (Hz) for dragging, but it is no longer needed.
